item.description:
Racing then cocktails and socializing

Arrive & Drive, 7 Days a Week!

If your thrill meter is running on empty, our Open Racing sessions are the perfect fuel! Open Racing sessions – known in Europe as Arrive & Drive – are available to the public 7 days per week. Call 781.848.2300 for hours and availability. Reservations recommended (annual license required).

You'll come in and suit up, receive a driver briefing, and pit yourself against other drivers scored by our computerized, split-second timing system – the same system used in professional racing.

Open racing sessions include a practice session and a race. And with our City Course and Country Course tracks, you can choose your challenge – from sharp turns, a corkscrew and tunnel to rolling hills and off-camber corners.

Life doesn't have to be dull.

Jan 22 will be the snow date...
item.how_to_find_us: ask for Roger and the Meetup Racers

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: F 1 Racing n Braintree
